banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: Easy ways to practice empathy in your own life
videoData.socialTitle: Easy ways to practice empathy in your own life

nodes.whoTheyAre: Gwen Yi Wong is a social entrepreneur based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. She is the founder and lead trainer of Tribeless, an impact-driven empathy training company.

videoData.description: In our busy, technologically-driven world, we need empathy more than ever. It's, as social entrepreneur Gwen Yi Wong puts it,  "the capacity to see parts of yourself in everybody else."  And it all starts with showing up for the people in our lives and really listening to them.
videoData.socialDescription: In our busy, technologically-driven world, we need empathy more than ever. It's, as social entrepreneur Gwen Yi Wong puts it,  "the capacity to see parts of yourself in everybody else."  And it all starts with showing up for the people in our lives and really listening to them.
